title: Bus Operations Limited due to fuel shortage
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Lanka Private Bus Owners Association said that Bus operations will be restricted on Monday (16) due to the shortage of fuel.
The Chairman of the Lanka Private Bus Owners Association Gemunu Wijeratne said if sufficient fuel is available today (16) bus services will resume normal operations from Tuesday (17).
Navy renders assistance to bring ashore ill fisherman for treatment
